page.title: 01DISCRIPTION OF SPAXTON.
page.content: SPAXTON IS A SMALL VILLAGE OF 800 INHABITANTS,WITH HOUSES SCATTERED OVER A WIDE AREA.THE VILLAGE HIGH STREET IS LONG WITH HOUSES ON EITHER SIDE.SPAXTON IS A {FARMING AREA.}WHEAT BEANS PEAS AND SWEDES ARE GROWN.DAIRY FARMING AND SHEEP GRAZING. HOUSES ARE EXPENSIVE AND MANY ARE OCCUPIED BY RETIRED AND PROFESSIONAL PEOPLE WHO SHOP WORK AND SEEK INTERESTS IN BRIDGWATER OR TAUNTON. OFTEN THEIR CHILDREN ATTEND SCHOOL IN OTHER VILLAGES OR PRIVATE SCHOOLS.YOUNG MARRIED COUPLES MOVE AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE SEEKING JOBS AND CHEAPER HOUSES. MAIN DRAINAGE CAME HERE IN 1985 PERHAPS NOW CHEAPER HOUSES WILL BE BUILT.
